targets.expr: sum by(orport, family, direction) (tor_relay_connections{family="ipv4", direction="initiated", orport=~"$orport"})
sum by(orport, family, direction) (tor_relay_connections{family="ipv6", direction="initiated", orport=~"$orport"})
sum by(orport, family, direction) (tor_relay_connections{family="ipv4", direction="received", orport=~"$orport"})
sum by(orport, direction, family) (tor_relay_connections{family="ipv6", direction="received", orport=~"$orport"})
